job_tasks.phrase: Write high-quality, efficient, and maintainable code while adhering to best practices and contributing to code reviews
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes traditional software engineering tasks focused on code quality, maintainability, and collaborative development practices like code reviews.

job_tasks.phrase: Build a highly scalable web platform based on Python and gRPC that can be deployed in different environments.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the core task of building and deploying a scalable web platform, which is a fundamental software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Design and develop interactions with the latest LLMs.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves working directly with LLMs, which falls under the specialization of AI/GenAI model interaction and development.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to a testing infrastructure that allows us to verify agentic AI behaviours.
job_tasks.justification: Building and contributing to testing infrastructure for AI behaviors aligns with the MLOps/LLMOps category, focusing on the operational aspects of AI systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Advocate for improvements to product quality, security, and performance
job_tasks.justification: Advocating for improvements in quality, security, and performance relates to understanding the product's business context and strategic goals for improvement.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with more Senior Engineers on the architectural plans and technical designs ensuring scalability, performance, maintainability and measurability of our Duo Workflow platform.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves collaborating on architectural plans and technical designs, focusing on core software engineering principles like scalability and maintainability.

job_tasks.phrase: Participate in Tier 2 or Tier 3 weekday, weekend, and/or occasional night on-call rotations to assist troubleshooting product operations, security operations, and urgent engineering issues.
job_tasks.justification: On-call rotations for troubleshooting product operations and engineering issues fall under the operational responsibilities of maintaining a software system.

job_tasks.phrase: As our new Backend Engineer, you'll build out our core service written that hosts and coordinates our AI agents.
job_tasks.justification: Building a core service that hosts and coordinates agents is a fundamental software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: You'll be involved in making sure the service follows up-to-date best practices for Python web development and orchestrating the communication between different services via gRPC
job_tasks.justification: This describes adherence to Python web development best practices and orchestrating inter-service communication, which are core backend engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: as well as contributing to the core AI functionality.
job_tasks.justification: While it mentions AI functionality, the context implies contributing to the *engineering* of that functionality within the broader service, rather than pure AI model research or development.

job_tasks.phrase: At this moment we're building an AI-Powered coding agent to speed up routine tasks, to improve your work, or to learn different approaches or technologies.
job_tasks.justification: Building an AI-powered coding agent implies interaction with LLMs and potentially prompt engineering to achieve specific developer-focused tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: At the same time we're building the underlying platform to power AI driven workflows across GitLab.
job_tasks.justification: Building the underlying platform for AI-driven workflows suggests a focus on the engineering and architecture that supports AI models, which can lean towards model development/integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Are you confident that AI is going to change our daily work as developers? Do you want to play an active role in shaping that future?
job_tasks.justification: These questions indicate a need for understanding the impact of AI on the business (developer workflow) and contributing to strategic future development.

job_tasks.phrase: The Duo Workflow Group at Gitlab is creating the future of AI driven development at GitLab.
job_tasks.justification: This statement highlights the strategic importance of AI-driven development for the company.

job_tasks.phrase: We're partnering with teams both within the AI space as well as all over GitLab to ensure that Duo Workflow can become the backbone of many AI features at GitLab.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes the strategic role of the Duo Workflow in enabling broader AI features across the company.

soft_skills.phrase: Embrace continuous learning and stay connected with industry best practices, tools, and technologies around AI to drive improvements in our software.
soft_skills.justification: This explicitly calls for continuous learning and staying updated with AI technologies and best practices.
Code reviews are a collaborative activity that requires communication and feedback among team members.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with more Senior Engineers on the architectural plans and technical designs
soft_skills.justification: This directly mentions collaboration with senior engineers on technical design and architecture.

soft_skills.phrase: Do you want to play an active role in shaping that future?
soft_skills.justification: This question implies a desire for ownership and active participation in shaping the future of AI development.

soft_skills.phrase: As our new Backend Engineer, you'll build out our core service written that hosts and coordinates our AI agents.
soft_skills.justification: Building out a core service implies taking ownership of a significant part of the product's functionality.

soft_skills.phrase: As a Python engineer through and through you'll spread your knowledge across a company where the main language is Ruby.
soft_skills.justification: Spreading knowledge and influencing practices in a different tech stack suggests taking initiative and ownership of knowledge sharing.

profile.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes core backend software engineering tasks (building scalable web platforms, Python development, gRPC, code reviews, architecture collaboration, on-call support) which fall under Macro-Category A. While it involves AI (AI-powered coding agent, LLMs, AI-driven workflows), the primary focus is on building and integrating these AI components into a larger software system, rather than deep model development or specialized GenAI tasks. The tasks related to AI are integrated into the software development lifecycle, making it an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer role.

confidence.reasoning: The job description is very clear about the core responsibilities being backend software engineering, with a specific focus on building a platform that hosts and coordinates AI agents. The distinction between building the platform and deep AI model work is evident. The tasks and technologies mentioned align well with the definition of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer.
